bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of newborns within the first three days following delivery with the anus closed and allowing no passage of stools. You ke lei cui 幼科類萃 3: 鎖肚者，由胎中受熱，熱毒 壅盛結於肛門，閉而不通 , “ Locked belly : this is because they were affected by heat while still in the womb. The heat poison caused obstruction with nodes of abundance at the anus which got blocked and became impassable”.
